thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Dollar Falls Against Peers

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Falls Against Peers
text:
The dollar fell against its peers Thursday, as choppy stock markets in the U.S. and around the globe pushed investors to take profits on recent gains in the currency.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar index, which gauges the buck against a basket of 16 currencies, was recently down 0.4% to 88.60, led by declines against the euro and yen. The index had gained in the last four sessions.
